text: Ra Anumzamo'a Agritegama kresramna vunentaza ita amefi hunemino Mono noma'anena amefi humi'ne. Ana nehuno ha' vahe zamazampi zamavarentege'za Jerusalemi kumapima kinimofo nontamima azeri agu'ma vazi'nea vihu keginaramina emeri anafa'a hu'naze. Ana nehu'za mono'ma hu knare'ma hiaza hu'za, ha' vahe'mo'za Ra Anumzamofo Mono nompi mareri'za ivimo agazamo huza tusi zamagasasa ru'naze.
